```{r setup}
library(crossdome)

data('mage_off_targets')
query <- 'EVDPIGHLY'

#

subject <- mage_off_targets$peptide_sequence
subject <- cross_universe(allele = "XXXXXXXXX")
#

rank <- cross_compose(query = query, subject = subject, widgets = FALSE)

#

second <- rank[1, 'subject']
cross_pairwise_plot(query = query, subject = second)

```
